FuncDef: The display ike statistics command displays the statistics information of IKE packets.
CLIs: display ike statistics { all | msg | v2 } [ slot <slot-number> [ engine <engine-id> ] | [ card <card-id> ] ]
display ike statistics { all | msg | v2 } [ slot <slot-number> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the statistics information of all IKE packets.
-

Displays the statistics information of IKE messages.
-

Displays the statistics information of IKEv2 packets.
-

Displays the statistics information in an specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates the engine ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

Indicates the card ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

ExtraInfo:
The output of the display ike statistics command provides the following information:
Number of the input and output IKE packetsNumber of the input and output IKE bytesNumber of discarded packets and detailed description of discarded packets
